metadata.name: Day Dreamin'
metadata.description:
ONDA's Day Dreamin' Collection, created by Ritchie Altamirano, features a variety of unique 20k 3D modeled posters/PFB (Profile Banner) art pieces designed to inspire, motivate and encourage people to be curious and engage. 

Each NFT is linked to an 8k asset and includes a gated portal that only the NFT collector can access. The portal contains 20K alt-size versions of the artwork for the collector to download for prints, social platform banners, or whatever they may need it for. 

Learn more about ONDA Studio and the collection at: https://onda.haus

NFT Portal (NFT must be in the wallet that you log in with): 
https://www.onda.haus/day-dreamin-portal
